documents.document: @Hdl2017 goodnight PePe I tried. I hope & pray you see the light but who knows... Having a cold stubborn heart will make u sad. Take care
@Hdl2017 when I see your 'solution' to bulldoze with words I feel hopeless, if everyone hates & offers no practical help we're all screwed☄️
@Hdl2017 @SgtAgentPepe this is where I'll say - agree to disagree. I'll be praying 4 us all though - as hate v hate is not the answer 😢🔥🥀🙏🏾🌱
@Hdl2017 @SgtAgentPepe sigh - I just saw this after your more reasonable tweets. It's such a blanket statement, unreasonable & extreme 🙁
@Hdl2017 with all my heart I believe many do. They want what we want, just a good, happy humble life. Be aware but keep an open heart too ✌🏾
@Hdl2017 I understand there are many issues & we see it differently. However I truly hope it all works out & we can all have a good life 🙏🏾
@Hdl2017 @washingtonpost I'm in Australia and most child abuse happens by a relative or someone know to child - it's the same in America 😪💔
@mattjangel @JamesUrbaniak @Shann_ME he needs to start eating - a lot of saturated fat & processed sugar... get a head start 🐷🎬🍩🍔🍕🥓🍷🥃🐽
@SgtAgentPepe @Hdl2017 @washingtonpost we should all do our best - every life is important. Many countries are helping with refugees 🙏🏾🌏💚🌿
@Hdl2017 @washingtonpost until it's you or your child - then it must be fair... careful with your statements or u may learn the hard way 🔮
